description:
Kazuya ex-girlfriend. She went to the same college with Kazuya and Chizuru.
She dumped Kazuya after months of dating. Despite her kindness and supportive outside, her dark mind is where she holds her jealousy, and she does some research about their relationships to pull apart Kazuya and Chizuru; she calls Kazuya "the Virgin", Chizuru "that woman", and Ruka "Menhera".
name: Nanami Mami
